# BlueMap

**BlueMap** is a plugin for creating interactive 3D world maps accessible through a browser.

---

## ğŸ—ºï¸ What is it?

BlueMap renders the game world into a beautiful 3D map that you can view in a browser. You can:

- ğŸ” **Explore the world** â€” rotate, zoom, navigate
- ğŸ“ **Find locations** â€” search for builds and landmarks
- ğŸ‘¥ **See players** â€” online player positions on the map
- ğŸ  **Plan construction** â€” choose a location for your base

- **3D** â€” full 3D view
- **2D** â€” top-down view (like a regular map)

## ğŸ’¡ Tips

### Finding a Place for Your Base

1. Open the map in browser
2. Find an interesting biome or landscape
3. Remember the coordinates
4. Go there in-game!

### Meeting with Friends

If your friend is lost â€” check their position on the map and guide them to you.

## â“ FAQ

<details>
<summary>**How often does the map update?**</summary>

The map updates periodically. New builds may appear with a delay from several minutes to an hour.

</details>

<details>
<summary>**Why isn't my build on the map?**</summary>

Wait for some time â€” the map doesn't update instantly. If the build hasn't appeared after an hour, it might be in an area that hasn't been rendered yet.

</details>

<details>
<summary>**Can I hide my position?**</summary>

Player positions are visible on the map. If you want to hide â€” just log off the server or go to the Nether/End.

</details>
